issue.title: [CF 1068] Animation recheck
issue.body:
im using an image overlay on icons to show, lack of combopoints and lack of range to target. If i have little combopoints the first overlay appears. If the combopoint is appearing and i step out of range it is overwritten by the lack of range. This in itself is fine as i dont want overlapping overlays, but if i step back into range, the icon does not show any animation at all even though i lack the combo points. It seems animations could use a recheck at the end of one to see if other animations on the icon still have conditions that are met. Also a priority of animations would be nice.

comments.body:
Fixed in g2b97d3c.

Quote:

While Condition Set Passing-triggered animations now work on a priority system, with those notifications higher in the configuration list having priority over lower-ranked notifications if both are eligible to play at the same time. This also prevents situations where no animations will play even though one should be.
